price: 75. (Al-Jidr) le dijo: “¿No te dije que no serías paciente conmigo?”.
arabic: ۞ قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul laka innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
